text: I mean the combos aren't working! It's... I don't think it's your fault, don't take it personally.
You're... You're doing good. ...You're a good boy.
C'mon, let's like... let's get drinks or something, blow off some steam! You did... good today.
Ohhh. Actually, I really gotta work out tonight. I already missed two nights this week. I can't miss a third night.

links.you-need-exercise: Yeah, you're looking a little chunky

links.boo-exercise: Well, can we hang out tomorrow?

you-need-exercise.text: Heh yeah, I thought you were looking a little chunky around the middle.

yay-exercise.text: Oh good for you, that's some good discipline! ...See you around.

boo-exercise.text: How about tomorrow then? ...Can we hang out tomorrow?
Uhhh, I gotta go. See you around!
